2024.title: React 19
2024.description: The latest version of React introduces server components, actions, and enhanced compiler optimizations for building highly interactive user interfaces with improved performance.

2024.title: Vue 4
2024.description: Vue.js continues to evolve with better TypeScript integration, improved reactivity system, and enhanced composition API for building modern web applications.

2024.title: Angular 17
2024.description: The latest Angular version features signals-based reactivity, standalone components by default, and improved server-side rendering capabilities.

2024.title: Next.js 15
2024.description: The React framework now features partial prerendering, enhanced Turbopack optimizations, and improved React Server Components support.

2024.title: TypeScript 5.4
2024.description: Latest TypeScript version with improved type inference, new utility types, and enhanced editor tooling for scalable application development.

2024.title: Tailwind CSS v4
2024.description: The utility-first CSS framework now features zero-runtime CSS-in-JS, improved theming system, and better performance optimizations.

2024.title: Bun 2.0
2024.description: The all-in-one JavaScript runtime now offers enhanced Node.js compatibility, improved performance, and built-in testing and packaging tools.

2024.title: Svelte 5
2024.description: Svelte 5 introduces runes, a new reactivity system, and compiler optimizations that significantly improve performance and developer experience.

2024.title: Remix 2.0
2024.description: The full-stack framework now features improved data loading patterns, enhanced deployment options, and better Vite integration.

2024.title: WebAssembly 2.0
2024.description: The next-generation binary format enables near-native performance in browsers with thread support, exception handling, and improved GC integration.

2024.title: Astro 4.0
2024.description: The island architecture framework now supports View Transitions API, improved hydration strategies, and enhanced MDX integration.

2024.title: Vite 5
2024.description: The next-gen frontend tooling features improved cold start performance, better SSR support, and enhanced plugin ecosystem.

2024.title: Qwik 2.0
2024.description: The resumable framework now offers improved developer experience, better React compatibility layer, and enhanced optimization capabilities.
